name: Mommy's New Born Baby - Baby Care and Free Home Adventure Games
name_original: Mommy's New Born Baby - Baby Care and Free Home Adventure Games
description:
Take care of Mommy's New Born Baby, Tap on all toys and produce awesome sounds for baby to keep the baby happy, Play Adventure mini games and take care of Baby.

Key Feature:
1. Great Toys with fun sounds and music.
2. Very Easy to play.
3. Challenging home adventure scene.
4. Make High scores and play advanced crazy levels.

Download & Play today, Enjoy!

Please rate this game to get us better and creating Amazing games for you.

Thanks for Playing!!
